items.summary: Update the School Detail page banner UI (component: `frontend/src/components/school/SchoolProfileBanner.tsx`) to avoid the current collage-style 2x2 image grid and instead render a single-row, 4-tile photo strip that visually matches the uploaded reference (`image-7.png`).

Adjust the School Detail banner pagination/controls in `frontend/src/components/school/SchoolProfileBanner.tsx` to match the reference interaction pattern: keep left/right navigation arrows for multi-page photo sets, and replace the current centered remaining-count overlay with a compact “See photos {count}” style control on the last visible tile when additional photos exist.
